short_summary: To acquire various electronic and fluid filter products to be supplied to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and BFC Esquimalt, Colombie-Britannique.
description: 1.CIRCUIT CARD ASSEMBLY, Part No. 3004060, NCAGE: 58915, 9 EA to be delivered to Halifax 2.CIRCUIT CARD ASSEMBLY, Part No. 1171485, 6 EA to be delivered to Esquimalt 3.FILTER ELEMENT, FLUID, Part No. POS1001SUV, 60 EA to be delivered to Halifax 4.FILTER ELEMENT, FLUID, Part No. 3500698, 60 EA to be delivered to Esquimalt
full_summary:
## Notice of Proposed Procurement

### Procurement Summary

The Department of National Defence invites you to submit a proposal for the procurement of credit card assembly and filter element, fluid. The requirement involves the delivery of goods to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

### Description of Items and Quantities

The following items are required:

* Item 1: 9 Credit Card Assemblies, NSN: 21-9088721, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
* Item 2: 6 Credit Card Assemblies, NSN: 21-9088721, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
* Item 3: 60 Filter Elements, Fluid, NSN: 01-4131100, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
* Item 4: 60 Filter Elements, Fluid, NSN: 01-4131100, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

### Submission Requirements

Bidders must submit their proposal in one of the official languages of Canada (English or French). All prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Bidders who propose an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAGE of the product being offered.

### Preference and Exclusions

There is a preference for Canadian goods and/or services. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

### Procurement Details

* Solicitation Number: W8482-230577/A
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-09-06T14:00:00
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Neil Trousdale
	+ Email: neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca

### Attachments

* The complete RFP can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/18/b2aa50f1f9575e795ab282c7cdf602b3/w8482-230577_-_english_rfp_clauses.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/18/b2aa50f1f9575e795ab282c7cdf602b3/w8482-230577_-_english_rfp_clauses.pdf)
* The complete RFP can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca
